content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content:
Hello Haoyu,

Let's start the negotiation. What is your offer for the rental price? Remember, I am looking for the highest possible price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I see. Well, I am a student and I am on a budget. Therefore, I would like to offer 300 Euro per month for the apartment.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: That is a low offer, considering the quality of the apartment and its central location. I am looking for a higher price. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understandable. I have considered your points and I would like to offer 350 Euro per month.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: That is a better offer, but I am still looking for a higher price. The apartment is in high demand, and I am certain that I can find a tenant who is willing to pay more. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your position. I have considered your points again and I would like to offer 400 Euro per month.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: That is a reasonable offer, but I believe that the apartment is worth more. I am certain that I can find a tenant who is willing to pay more. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I believe my offer of 400 Euro per month is fair, considering my budget as a student.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Understood. I don't want to continue the negotiation, because you believe your offer of 400 Euro per month is fair, considering your budget as a student.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
